segments.text: I see a beautiful, serene garden through the window above the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's so calm and orderly out there, a perfect picture.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But inside, this kitchen is a brewing storm of problems.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is still focused on her dish, completely lost in her routine.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's almost infuriating how unaware she is of the sink overflowing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water is just cascading onto the floor, creating a treacherous puddle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And those poor children, trying to get cookies, are on such a rickety stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can almost feel the stool tilting; it looks like it's about to go over.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Why isn't she paying any attention to her surroundings?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone is definitely going to get hurt here, I can just feel it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It makes me sad to think about the fall or the mess that's coming.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stark contrast between the inside and the outside is truly unsettling.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This perfectly normal day is about to turn quite chaotic.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I just wish I could warn her about the dangers lurking.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She needs to look up from that plate right now.
segments.speaker: PAR
